pages.text: The Pyre has a variety of uses for the aspiring druid, and is used for crafting herbs as well as performing powerful rituals. Various resources that may be necessary for a ritual are listed elsewhere in this book.$(br2)In all usage cases, the Pyre is typically activated by placing the required combination of items onto the pyre itself and then igniting
it with a $(info) flint and steel.$(br2)Moreover, ongoing rituals (crafting included) can be canceled by applying a $(l:basics/bucket_of_water)bucket of water$() to the pyre.

pages.title: Pyre
pages.text: $(info) Some rituals require runestone in specific configurations in addition to the pyre or have other requirements, in which case the required structure(s) will be listed alongside the ritual.
